description: A workflow specification connection represents a many-to-many link between workflow specification nodes.
title: Workflow specification connection
$comment: According to ANSI/ISA-95.00.04-2018 Enterprise-Control System Integration âˆ’ Part 4: Objects and Attributes for - Approved 24 May 2018

links.dtdl:description: The workflow specification connection defined by this workflow specification connection type.
The workflow specification connection property(s) defines in part of this workflow specification connection.
The workflow specification node connected to this workflow specification connection.
The workflow specification node connected from this workflow specification connection.

dependencyType.title: Dependency Type
dependencyType.description: Defines the execution dependency constraints of one workflow specification node to another workflow specification node as the type of the execution or dependency factor between the them.

oneOf.title: Possible parallel
oneOf.description: B may run in parallel to A

oneOf.title: Not in parallel
oneOf.description: B may not run in parallel to A

oneOf.title: No later after start
oneOf.description: start B no later than dependency factor after A start

oneOf.title: No earlier after start
oneOf.description: start B no earlier than dependency factor after A start

oneOf.title: No later after end
oneOf.description: start B no later than dependency factor after A end

oneOf.title: No earlier after end
oneOf.description: B no earlier than dependency factor after A end

dependencyFactorUnitOfMeasure.title: Dependency factor unit of measure
dependencyFactorUnitOfMeasure.description: The units of measure of the dependency factor
